title: In pictures: The novel coronavirus outbreak
description: The novel coronavirus was first reported in late December in Wuhan, a city of 11 million people in central China's Hubei province. It has now found a foothold on every continent except Antarctica.
content:
A woman in London shows her support for British Prime Minister Boris Johnson on Tuesday, April 7. Johnson was hospitalized after his coronavirus symptoms "worsened," according to his office.
The novel coronavirus is spreading across the world.
